Sentencas: Biogas is a renewable biofuel that contains a lot of CH4 and CO2.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich syngas production and carbon dioxide formation using aqueous urea solution in biogas steam reforming by thermodynamic analysis

Sentencas: Biogas can be used to produce heat and electric power while reducing CH4, one of greenhouse gas emissions.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich syngas production and carbon dioxide formation using aqueous urea solution in biogas steam reforming by thermodynamic analysis

Sentencas: As a result, it has been getting increasing academic attention.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich syngas production and carbon dioxide formation using aqueous urea solution in biogas steam reforming by thermodynamic analysis

Sentencas: There are some application ways of biogas; biogas can produce hydrogen to feed a fuel cell by reforming process.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich syngas production and carbon dioxide formation using aqueous urea solution in biogas steam reforming by thermodynamic analysis

Sentencas: Urea is also a hydrogen carrier and could produce hydrogen by steam reforming.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich syngas production and carbon dioxide formation using aqueous urea solution in biogas steam reforming by thermodynamic analysis

Sentencas: This study then employes steam reforming of biogas and compares hydrogen-rich syngas production and carbon dioxide with various methane concentrations using steam and aqueous urea solution (AUS) by Thermodynamic analysis.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich syngas production and carbon dioxide formation using aqueous urea solution in biogas steam reforming by thermodynamic analysis

Sentencas: The results show that the utilization of AUS as a replacement for steam enriches the production of H-2 and CO and has a slight CO2 rise compared with pure biogas steam reforming at a temperature higher than 800 degrees C. However, CO2 formation is less than the initial CO2 in biogas.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich syngas production and carbon dioxide formation using aqueous urea solution in biogas steam reforming by thermodynamic analysis

Sentencas: At the reaction temperature of 700 degrees C, carbon formation does not occur in the reforming process for steam/biogas ratios higher than 2.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich syngas production and carbon dioxide formation using aqueous urea solution in biogas steam reforming by thermodynamic analysis

Sentencas: These conditions led to the highest H-2, CO production, and reforming efficiency (about 125%).
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich syngas production and carbon dioxide formation using aqueous urea solution in biogas steam reforming by thermodynamic analysis

Sentencas: The results can be used as operation data for systems that combine biogas reforming and applied to solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), which usually operates between 700 degrees C to 900 degrees C to generate electric power in the future.
Titulo: Hydrogen-rich syngas production and carbon dioxide formation using aqueous urea solution in biogas steam reforming by thermodynamic analysis
